data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Pudukkottai access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pudukkottai, Tamil Nadu, India

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Pudukkottai with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Pudukkottai.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Pudukkottai do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Vellalan Sozhia people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Vellalan Sozhia people know you.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Pudukkottai, Tamil Nadu, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Please, teach the 17,801 believers in Pudukkottai, Tamil Nadu, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Pudukkottai, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

location.name: Pudukkottai
location.people_groups_list: Maravan, Adaviar, Vathiriyan (Hindu traditions), Pagadai, Oochan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Maravan (3,193,000), Adaviar (200), Vathiriyan (Hindu traditions) (9,200), Pagadai (8,200), Oochan (1,000)
